Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}

{3: 'Seeing how Vera has made herself comfortable, you assume she intends to rest in the Gray Raven lounge for a while. You instinctively quiet down while working, and you even prepare an unused sleeping pod for her.'}
{3: 'But upon activating the sleeping pod, you notice the Construct behind you has opened her eyes at some point, quietly watching you.'}
{2: 'Hmm? When did you wake up?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Your chair's uncomfortable, so I couldn't sleep. Get me a pillow next time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sure.', 3: '9', 4: 'You sure know how to boss people around.', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Don't be so obedient next time. People will keep pushing you around if you do, got it?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't mind it if it's certain people."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Forget it. There's no reasoning with someone like you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'These everyday moments where you can exchange banter with someone else are more precious than you realize. You should be grateful for them.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yeah, I suppose that's fair.", 3: '15'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Unfortunately, your choices have made "everyday life" into a rare commodity.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera suddenly sits up straight.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'If the surface is so dangerous, why did you choose to become a Task Force commandant in the first place? Almost any other job would be safer than running to the frontline every day like you do now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Oh, and you won't have to hear shocking rumors about yourself every now and then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Shouldn't you get to choose any post you want as a Chief of F.O.S.? Was someone pressuring you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No one pressured me. It was my choice.', 3: '24'}
{3: 'You cannot help but recall the events surrounding your graduation. The prior training, the ceremony, the career paths... And yet there is always a hollow emptiness that remains unfilled.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Was it because of something you saw on the surface?', 4: '1'}
{3: "And Vera's answer precisely fills that voidâ€”this seems to be the explanation."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'A dull pain throbs in your head, even though your last medical examination assured you that everything was fine.'}
{2: 'Have I... forgotten something?', 3: '35'}
{3: "Vera's expression remains unchanged. She simply gazes at you quietly, saying nothing."}
{2: 'And you, Vera?', 3: '39'}
{2: 'Yeah. Why did you come to Babylonia, Vera?', 3: '41'}
{2: "Lee once told me you were part of Kurono's Special Force.", 3: '42'}
{2: 'Was Nikola pressuring you?', 3: '43'}
{3: "You mimic Vera's tone while you ask the question, and you cannot help but chuckle as well. Vera's expression also softens a bit."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Haha, my story is a long and exhausting tale. There's nothing particularly interesting.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'From considering joining Babylonia to finally making the decision, it was a long process.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Someone gave me a push along the way as well.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera looks at you again.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If you've got nothing better to do, I suppose I can tell you about it.", 4: '1'}
